import-mapping.description: ImportMapping specifies the golang package path for each external reference

CompatibilityOptions.description:
CompatibilityOptions specifies backward compatibility settings for the
code generator.

chi-server.description: ChiServer specifies whether to generate chi server boilerplate

fiber-server.description: FiberServer specifies whether to generate fiber server boilerplate

echo-server.description: EchoServer specifies whether to generate echo server boilerplate

gin-server.description: GinServer specifies whether to generate gin server boilerplate

gorilla-server.description: GorillaServer specifies whether to generate Gorilla server boilerplate

strict-server.description: Strict specifies whether to generate strict server wrapper

client.description: Client specifies whether to generate client boilerplate

models.description: Models specifies whether to generate type definitions

embedded-spec.description: Whether to embed the swagger spec in the generated code

GenerateOptions.description: GenerateOptions specifies which supported output formats to generate.

skip-fmt.description: Whether to skip go imports on the generated code

skip-prune.description: Whether to skip pruning unused components on the generated code

include-tags.description: Only include operations that have one of these tags. Ignored when empty.

exclude-tags.description: Exclude operations that have one of these tags. Ignored when empty.

user-templates.description: Override built-in templates from user-provided files

exclude-schemas.description: Exclude from generation schemas with given names. Ignored when empty.

response-type-suffix.description: The suffix used for responses types

client-type-name.description: Override the default generated client type with the value

initialism-overrides.description: Whether to use the initialism overrides

OutputOptions.description: OutputOptions are used to modify the output code in some way.
